title: Jennifer Hawkins shows off her baby bump in a floral midriff
text:
Jennifer Hawkins is expecting her first child, a baby girl, with husband Jake Wall, 36.

And in an Instagram post on Sunday, the model proudly showed off her growing bump in two photos taken at the couple's Newport mansion in Sydney.

Sporting a matching floral midriff and maxi-skirt that exposed her belly, the 35-year-old joked in the caption about 'letting it all hang out'.

'Letting it all hang out!' Jennifer Hawkins, 35, proudly showed off her baby bump in a stunning photo taken at her Newport mansion in Sydney, and shared it to Instagram on Sunday

'Such a beautiful afternoon!! I have dreamed of having this watermelon sized bump for years, sooo I'm letting it all hang out!!' Jennifer shared online.

The caption ran alongside two photos, one of which saw the former face of Myer lounging on a porch swing, on the balcony of her and Jake's Newport mansion.

Jennifer's bump was exposed in the pink floral two-piece, and her blonde locks fell predominately to one side.

Bumping along nicely: A second shot within the post, saw Jennifer taking a mirror selfie and drawing attention to her mid-section in a matching floral midriff and maxi-skirt

A further shot saw the entrepreneur taking a mirror selfie inside the couple's home, with a makeup-free Jennifer beaming for the camera.

Jennifer and Jake announced they were expecting in an Instagram post in May, sharing the same photo to their respective accounts of the couple posing together.

'I'm sooo happy to share with you some exciting news! Jake and I are expecting a baby girl!!! We can't wait to meet her!' Jennifer addressed her followers.

'Thank you to our beautiful family and friends for their love and support and, most importantly, to my hubby Jake – I can't wait to see you as a Daddy!' she continued.

Baby joy: Jennifer and Jake, 36, announced they were expecting in an Instagram post in May, sharing the same photo to their respective accounts of the couple posing together

Babies on the brain: Jennifer expressed her desire to start a family in September last year, following her departure from Myer

Jennifer expressed her desire to start a family in September last year, following her departure from Myer.

At the time, Jennifer had been the department store's ambassador for an incredible 12 years.

Speaking at her final runway show for the retailer, she told the Herald Sun: 'I'd love to have a family, it's taking the time to look ahead. I want to have the time to be able to do that.'

Jennifer wed Jake in a lavish Bali ceremony in 2013, after eight years of dating.
description: Jennifer Hawkins is expecting her first child, a baby girl, with husband Jake Wall, 36.
authors: Kristy Johnson For Daily Mail Australia
